actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and one Claw. If it hits one creature with both creature: DC 13 Str save or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.
